PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTypeFuseDisconnector
PropertySetDef.Definition: A coherent set of attributes representing the breaking capacity of a fuse, defined in accordance with IEC 60269. Note - A protective device may be associated with different instances of this pSet providing information related to different basic characteristics.

PropertyDef.Name: FuseDisconnectorType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of fuse disconnector from which that required may be selected where:EngineProtectionDevice: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of a motor or generator. FuseSwitchDisconnector: A switch disconnector in which a fuse link or a fuse carrier with fuse link forms the moving contact, HRC: A standard fuse (High Rupturing Capacity) OverloadProtectionDevice: A device that disconnects the supply when the operating conditions in an electrically undamaged circuit causes an overcurrent, SemiconductorFuse: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of sem-conductor devices. SwitchDisconnectorFuse: A switch disconnector in which one or more poles have a fuse in series in a composite unit.

PropertyDef.Name: VoltageLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage levels for which the data of the instance is valid. More than one value may be selected in the enumeration.

PropertyDef.Name: IC60269
PropertyDef.Definition: The breaking capacity in [A] for fuses in accordance with the IEC 60269 series.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerLoss
PropertyDef.Definition:
The power loss in [W].
The power loss in [W] of the fuse when the nominal current is flowing through the fuse.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPhases
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of phases that the equipment operates on.

PropertyDef.Name: BreakingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: The current that a fuse, circuit breaker, or other electrical apparatus is able to interrupt without being destroyed or causing an electric arc with unacceptable duration.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfPoles
PropertyDef.Definition:
Number of poles that the object would affect.
Number of poles that the equipment would affect.

PropertyDef.Name: TransformationRatio
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio of the actual primary current or voltage to the actual secondary current or voltage.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalFrequency
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal frequency of the supply.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCurrent
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal current that is designed to be measured.

PropertyDef.Name: RatedVoltage
PropertyDef.Definition: The range of allowed voltage that a device is certified to handle. The upper bound of this value is the maximum.
